uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools
Class ImageMarker

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.ImageMarker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, Marker
public class ImageMarker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Marker, java.awt.image.ImageObserver

ImageMarker creates a marker icon out of images passed in as parameters. The (x,y) point provided is used as the center point of the icon.

Author:
Peter.Pan@comsat.com, Cameron Shorter

Fields inherited from interface java.awt.image.ImageObserver
ABORT, ALLBITS, ERROR, FRAMEBITS, HEIGHT, PROPERTIES, SOMEBITS, WIDTH

          Initialise the class, providing an ImageObserver to notify if the icons have not been loaded when we first try to draw it.
ImageMarker(java.awt.Image normalImage, java.awt.Image highlightedImage, Layer layer)
          Initialise the class, if the icons are not ready to be drawn when first called, a notifyLayerChangedListeners event is sent when the icons are loaded.
 
Method Summary
 boolean imageUpdate(java.awt.Image img, int infoflags, int x, int y, int width, int height)
